A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 15, 2010'''.<ref>[[wordofnotch:701052977|Dynamic water and Buckets]] – The Word of Notch, June 15, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Bucket
|Water Bucket
|Lava Bucket
}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bucket]]'''
* Crafted with [[iron ingot]].
{{Crafting table
|A2= Iron Ingot
|C2= Iron Ingot
|B3= Iron Ingot
|Output= Bucket}}
* Collects [[water]] and [[lava]].

'''[[File:Water Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Water Bucket]]'''
* Spills water.
* Cannot be placed onto a [[block]] already containing a [[liquid]] to replace it; only non-liquid blocks can be used to replace liquids.

'''[[File:Lava Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lava Bucket]]'''
* Spills lava.
* Cannot be placed onto a block already containing a liquid to replace it; only non-liquid blocks can be used to replace liquids.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Fast/fancy graphics toggle.
** This option toggles the [[clouds]] between 2D and 3D. Fast clouds are identical to the old clouds. Fancy graphics are preset by default.
** [[Entity]] shadows becomes invisible when fast graphics enabled.

== Changes ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Door JE2.png|32px]] [[Wooden Door|Doors]]'''
* Now drop when broken by upgrading some worlds.{{More info|What exactly does "drop when broken by upgrading some worlds" mean?}}

'''[[File:Lava JE10.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE8.png|32px]].
* Now they can flow.
** [[Entities]] (except shot [[arrow]]s) in flowing [[liquid]] move along with the current.
** Can be spread infinitely like water.

'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE2.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* Leaves now decay.

'''[[File:Water JE8.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Water JE6.png|32px]].
* Now they can flow.
** [[Entities]] (except shot [[arrow]]s) in flowing [[liquid]] move along with the current.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Daylight cycle]]'''

* Days are now slightly longer than nights. Day lasts around 9 Minutes 15 seconds, Night lasts around 8 minutes.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Lava does not correctly clear up once removing the source.
* Blocks removed by flowing liquids do not drop themselves.
